name: Dropwell
description:
This is a game which was originally made for a Game Jam with a theme of "No Violence". Because of unavailability it is now a normal Game but i still took the "No Violence" theme in count.

Enjoy!

---- Controls ----

WASD - Movement

F - Ability 1

Shift - Ability 2

ESC - Pause

note: WebGL version has technical sound limitations and lower framerate
